Posts.Content: lovelyfaith wrote: My husband has found a lump, we have had an ultra sound and mammogram completed. He is scheduled to meet with a surgeon this week. What questions should we ask? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: What ?s to ask lovelyfaith Shirlann

Posts.Content: Mar 19, 2007 02:15AM lovelyfaith wrote: Thank you for your response. We have met with the family doctor and he has suggested a Exsional Biopsy as the solid mass is 12mm at its greatest length. Please keep us in your thoughts this week. Thank you.
